sentences.greeting: Hello welcome to the restaurant dinner for one!
sentences.estimateAmountOfPeople: I would like to estimate the amount of people of your group.
sentences.stayInFrontOfMe: Please come and stay in front of me.
sentences.askAmountToSearch: For how many people should I search a table?
sentences.availableTables: We have tables for {} to {} persons
sentences.askToSearchTableForOnePerson: Would you like me to search a table for a single person?
sentences.askToSearchTableForMultiplePersons: Would you like me to search a table for {} people?
sentences.noTablesForAmount: Unfortunately, we do not have a table for this amount of people.
sentences.searchTable: Please wait. I will search the perfect table for you
sentences.askToFollow: Thank you for your patience. Please follow me to your table.
sentences.assignTable: This is your table. Please wait. A human employee will be serving you shortly. Enjoy your stay.
